title: PBE July 2016
body: I just got accepted into the PBE. I went back to the website that had the tabs that say apply, pending, create account, etc, and though I received an email saying I was accepted into the PBE, it has me stuck on the "pending" tab. I downloaded the PBE application and can sign in with my regular account credentials, but the store is unavailable and so is the news tab. I'm lost as to what to do in the PBE as there isn't much direction or options and I thought I was given all the champions in the PBE. Someone please give me direction! Thanks.

replies.body:
I looked into this for you and it looks like you've actually been accepted into the Alpha Client, which is very different than the PBE. [Alpha client access](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/client-update) allows you to use the new client on the live servers, while [PBE access](https://pbesignup.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/pbe) lets you enter the test environment which is outside of the live servers to test new content and balance changes before they hit the live servers. Store and News aren't added to the Alpha Client yet, so this is normal behavior at the moment. 

Let me know if you have any questions!

Thank you so much for looking into this, I appreciate it so much. Does being apart of the Alpha Client mean that I won't be able to take part in the PBE? I wanted to get to try out Kled when he is launched in a few weeks, look at all the maybe upcoming stuff, and actually be an active part of the league community regarding to feedback and potential bugs. If there's anything I should do to be apart of that, I would love to know! Thanks.

Having Alpha Client access doesn't mean you won't be able to participate in the PBE, as they're both different systems and at the moment, you've been invited to only one. I see you've recently applied to the PBE, so all there's left to do is wait to see if/when you'll get invited. For more information on the PBE, [check out our FAQ.
](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751904-Public-Beta-Environment-FAQ#top)
lol I got accepted to alpha client too and I thought its the same as pbe.. dont worry alpha client is pretty cool. Im still hoping to be a pbe member someday! dont ever give up!

To get all your champions, keep clicking onto shop and it should eventually open and then go to "Bundles". 

There should be a PBE package bundle which unlocks you all the champions, and a bunch or ip/ rp.
That is only when your accessed to the PBE but he is only accessed to the alpha client which is basically like the same server except its just using a different client.
